page.title: 10VILLAGE BORN AND BRED(1)
page.content: {Interview with school dinner lady,born {and bred in Marsh Gibbon. I have lived in the village for nearly all my life,there were just two years when I lived in the next village but even then I came back every day. There have been a lot of changes,the old villlage hall has gone and we have a new one,the chapel has gone and we have a new one,the old school has been converted into houses and we have got a new one. The old village hall was just a tin hut but we had jolly good fun in there. We didn't have any taps in our houses we had to use the taps beside the road. There used to be a diamond cutter in the village,a blacksmith and three cobblers and a man who was very good at thatching ricks for all the farmers and I helped him sometimes.
